languages.text: "На тернистом пути мы обретаем не только шрамы, но и бесценные сокровища. Чтобы познать чужую душу... твоя собственная должна сиять не менее ярко. Я увидела свет твоей души, {name}. Он рассеет тьму, что нас ждет".

"As we walk down the road of thorns, we acquire not only scars but priceless treasures also. To know a stranger's soul, your own must shine just as brightly. I saw the light of your soul, {name}. It will drive away the darkness before us."
languages.original_text: "На тернистом пути мы обретаем не только шрамы, но и бесценные сокровища. Чтобы познать чужую душу... твоя собственная должна сиять не менее ярко. Я увидела свет твоей души, {name}. Он рассеет тьму, что нас ждет".

traits.locale_text: "As we walk down the road of thorns, we acquire not only scars but priceless treasures also. To know a stranger's soul, your own must shine just as brightly. I saw the light of your soul, {name}. It will drive away the darkness before us."

"As we walk down the road of thorns, we acquire not only scars but priceless treasures also. To know a stranger's soul, your own must shine just as brightly. I saw the light of your soul, {name}. It will drive away the darkness before us."

languages.text: “当我们走过这条荆棘之路时，我们得到的不仅仅是伤痕，还有无价之宝。若要了解陌生人的灵魂，你自己的灵魂必须同样明亮。我看到了你灵魂中的光芒，{name}，它会驱走我们面前的黑暗。”
languages.original_text: "As we walk down the road of thorns, we acquire not only scars but priceless treasures also. To know a stranger's soul, your own must shine just as brightly. I saw the light of your soul, {name}. It will drive away the darkness before us."

traits.locale_text: “当我们走过这条荆棘之路时，我们得到的不仅仅是伤痕，还有无价之宝。若要了解陌生人的灵魂，你自己的灵魂必须同样明亮。我看到了你灵魂中的光芒，{name}，它会驱走我们面前的黑暗。”

languages.text: «Mientras recorremos el camino de espinas, adquirimos tantas cicatrices como tesoros de valor incalculable. Para conocer el alma de un desconocido, la tuya debe brillar con la misma intensidad. Veo la luz de tu alma, {name}. Disipará la oscuridad que nos aguarda».
languages.original_text: "As we walk down the road of thorns, we acquire not only scars but priceless treasures also. To know a stranger's soul, your own must shine just as brightly. I saw the light of your soul, {name}. It will drive away the darkness before us."

traits.locale_text: «Mientras recorremos el camino de espinas, adquirimos tantas cicatrices como tesoros de valor incalculable. Para conocer el alma de un desconocido, la tuya debe brillar con la misma intensidad. Veo la luz de tu alma, {name}. Disipará la oscuridad que nos aguarda».

languages.text: 「いばらの道を歩くとき、傷痕が増えるだけではなく、かけがえのない宝物も手に入れる。見知らぬ者の魂を知るには、自分自身の魂も同じように輝きを放つ必要がある。私にはあなたの魂の光が見えたのだ、{name}。それが目の前の闇を追い払ってくれるだろう」
languages.original_text: "As we walk down the road of thorns, we acquire not only scars but priceless treasures also. To know a stranger's soul, your own must shine just as brightly. I saw the light of your soul, {name}. It will drive away the darkness before us."

traits.locale_text: 「いばらの道を歩くとき、傷痕が増えるだけではなく、かけがえのない宝物も手に入れる。見知らぬ者の魂を知るには、自分自身の魂も同じように輝きを放つ必要がある。私にはあなたの魂の光が見えたのだ、{name}。それが目の前の闇を追い払ってくれるだろう」

languages.text: "Auf unserem Weg über die Straße der Dornen sammeln wir nicht nur Narben, sondern auch wertvolle Schätze. Um die Seele eines Fremden zu kennen, muss die eigene Seele ebenso hell strahlen. Ich habe das Licht Eurer Seele gesehen, {name}. Es wird die Dunkelheit, die vor uns liegt, vertreiben."
languages.original_text: "As we walk down the road of thorns, we acquire not only scars but priceless treasures also. To know a stranger's soul, your own must shine just as brightly. I saw the light of your soul, {name}. It will drive away the darkness before us."

traits.locale_text: "Auf unserem Weg über die Straße der Dornen sammeln wir nicht nur Narben, sondern auch wertvolle Schätze. Um die Seele eines Fremden zu kennen, muss die eigene Seele ebenso hell strahlen. Ich habe das Licht Eurer Seele gesehen, {name}. Es wird die Dunkelheit, die vor uns liegt, vertreiben."

languages.text: « À mesure que nous arpentons les sentiers épineux de la vie, nous accumulons non seulement des cicatrices, mais également de précieux trésors. Pour connaître l'âme d'un étranger, la vôtre doit briller d'un éclat tout aussi vif. J'ai vu la lumière de votre âme, {name}. Elle chassera les ténèbres devant nous. »
languages.original_text: "As we walk down the road of thorns, we acquire not only scars but priceless treasures also. To know a stranger's soul, your own must shine just as brightly. I saw the light of your soul, {name}. It will drive away the darkness before us."

traits.locale_text: « À mesure que nous arpentons les sentiers épineux de la vie, nous accumulons non seulement des cicatrices, mais également de précieux trésors. Pour connaître l'âme d'un étranger, la vôtre doit briller d'un éclat tout aussi vif. J'ai vu la lumière de votre âme, {name}. Elle chassera les ténèbres devant nous. »

languages.text: "Dikenlerle kaplı bu yolda yürürken yalnızca yara bere içinde kalmadık, aynı zamanda paha biçilmez hazineler de elde ettik. Bir yabancının ruhunu tanıyabilmek için kendi ruhunun göz alıcı bir parlaklığa sahip olması gerekir. Senin ruhunun ışığına şahit oldum {name}. Önümüzdeki karanlığı bertaraf edecektir."
languages.original_text: "As we walk down the road of thorns, we acquire not only scars but priceless treasures also. To know a stranger's soul, your own must shine just as brightly. I saw the light of your soul, {name}. It will drive away the darkness before us."
